application.doc: For managers, plan shift schedules, broadcast open and unfilled shifts to your team. For team members, easily view your shifts and make schedule-change requests (swap/offer/time off).

doc.title: Get a Schedule's details This operation returns details of a Schedule using the Schedule's unique ID.
List all Time Off instances in a team This operation returns all Time Off instances in a Schedule
Create a new Time Off instance This operation creates a new Time Off instance and assigns it to a member of the team
The unique ID of the Time Off.
Get a Time Off instance This operation returns details for a Time Off using its unique ID.
The unique ID of the Time Off.
Delete a Time Off instance This operation deletes a Time Off using its unique ID.
List all Shifts in a team This operation returns all Shifts assigned to members of a team
Create a new Shift This operation creates a new Shift and assigns it to a member of the team
The unique ID of the Shift.
Get a Shift This operation returns details for a Shift using the Shift's unique ID.
The unique ID of the Shift.
Delete a Shift This operation deletes a Shift using the Shift's unique ID.
List all Open Shifts in a team This operation returns all Open Shifts in a team.
Create a new Open Shift Create a new Open Shift in a Schedule.
The unique ID of the Open Shift.
Get an Open Shift This operation returns details for an Open Shift.
The unique ID of the Open Shift.
Update an Open Shift Update an Open Shift in a Schedule.
The unique ID of the Open Shift.
Delete an Open Shift This operation deletes an Open Shift.
List all Time Off Reasons in a team This operation returns the list of Time Off Reasons associated with a team.
List all Scheduling Groups in a team This operation returns all Scheduling Groups in a Schedule.
The unique ID of the Scheduling Group.
Get a Scheduling Group This operation returns details for a Scheduling Group using its unique ID.
List all Time Off requests in a team This operation returns all Time Off requests in a Schedule.
The unique ID of the Time Off request
Get a Time Off request This operation returns a Time Off request by ID.
The unique ID of the Time Off request
Approve a Time Off request This operation allows managers to approve a Time Off request.
The unique ID of the Time Off request
Decline a Time Off request This operation allows managers to decline a Time Off request.
List all Offer Shift requests in a team This operation returns all Offer Shift requests in a Schedule.
The unique ID of the Offer Shift request
Get an Offer Shift request This operation returns an Offer Shift request by ID.
The unique ID of the Offer Shift request
Approve an Offer Shift request This operation allows recipients/managers to approve an Offer Shift request.
The unique ID of the Offer Shift request
Decline an Offer Shift request This operation allows users to decline an Offer Shift request.
List all Swap Shifts requests in a team This operation returns all Swap Shifts requests in a Schedule.
The unique ID of the request
Get a Swap Shifts request This operation returns a Swap Shifts request by ID.
The unique ID of the request
Approve a Swap Shifts request This operation allows a user to approve a Swap Shifts request.
The unique ID of the request
Decline a Swap Shifts request This operation allows users to decline a Swap Shifts request.
List all Open Shift requests in a team This operation returns all Open Shift change requests in a Schedule.
The unique ID of the request
Get an Open Shift request This operation returns an Open Shift change request by ID.
The unique ID of the request
Approve an Open Shift request This operation allows managers to approve an Open Shift request.
The unique ID of the request
Decline an Open Shift request This operation allows managers to decline an Open Shift request.
List all Open Shifts from my teams This operation returns Open Shifts that need to be filled from all your teams.
List all Shifts from my teams This operation returns assigned Shifts from all your teams.
List all Times Off from my teams This operation returns times when people are off from all your teams.
How many times off to fetch
